content.raw:
I think this has already been fixed by computing it inside the Atlas Plugin (see #!/osrf/drcsim/src/f0f919ec908db051bb7657e2bd0d8e0d7b06583f/plugins/ros/AtlasPlugin.cc?at=drcsim_1.3.0#cl-240). 

In the version I'm running (drcsim_1.3 I think) it publishes odometry messages on /atlas/imu that don't seem to have such crazy accelerations. So the remaining fix would be to publish imu messages instead of odometry (unless this has already been done in some newer version).
